Field Label: Did acute GVHD develop since the date of last report?
Did acute GVHD persist since the date of last report?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: UNDEFINED_CODE, Yes | UNDEFINED_CODE_1, No | UNDEFINED_CODE_2, Unknown

Field Label: Maximum overall grade of acute GVHD
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: UNDEFINED_CODE, I - Rash on < 50% of skin, no liver or gut involvement|UNDEFINED_CODE_1, II - Rash on > 50% of skin, bilirubin 2-3 mg/dL, or diarrhea 500-1000 mL/day or persistent nausea or vomiting|UNDEFINED_CODE_2, Ill - Bilirubin 3-15 mg/dL, or gut stage 2-4 diarrhea > 1000 mL/day or severe abdominal pain with or without ileus|UNDEFINED_CODE_3, IV - Generalized erythroderma with bullous formation, or bilirubin > 15 mg/dL|UNDEFINED_CODE_4, Not applicable (acute GVHD present but cannot be graded)

Field Label: Date maximum overall grade of acute GVHD
Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Skin
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: UNDEFINED_CODE, Stage 0 - no rash, no rash attributable to acute GVHD|UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Stage 1 - maculopapular rash, < 25% of body surface|UNDEFINED_CODE_2, Stage 2 - maculopapular rash, 25-50% of body surface|UNDEFINED_CODE_3, Stage 3 - generalized erythroderma, > 50% of body surface|UNDEFINED_CODE_4, Stage 4 - generalized erythroderma with bullae formation and/or desquamation

Field Label: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Lower intestinal tract (use mL/day for adult recipients and mL/kg/day for pediatric recipients)
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: UNDEFINED_CODE, Stage 0 - no diarrhea, no diarrhea attributable to acute GVHD /diarrhea< 500 mL/day (adult), or <10 mL/kg/day (pediatric)|UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Stage 1 - diarrhea 500 - 1000 mL/day (adult), or 10 - 19.9 mL/kg/day (pediatric)|UNDEFINED_CODE_2, Stage 2 - diarrhea 1001 - 1500 mL/day (adult), or 20-30 mL/kg/day (pediatric)|UNDEFINED_CODE_3, Stage 3 - diarrhea > 1500 mL/day (adult), or >30 mL/kg/day (pediatric)|UNDEFINED_CODE_4, Stage 4 - severe abdominal pain, with or without ileus, and/or grossly bloody stool

Field Label: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Upper instestinal tract
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: UNDEFINED_CODE, Stage 0 - no persistent nausea or vomiting|UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Stage 1 - persistent nausea or vomiting

Field Label: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Liver
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: UNDEFINED_CODE, Stage 0 - No liver acute GVHD / bilirubin < 2.0 mg/dL (< 34 µmol/L)|UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Stage 1 - bilirubin 2.0- 3.0 mg/dL (34-52 µmol/L)|UNDEFINED_CODE_2, Stage 2 - bilirubin 3.1-6.0 mg/dL (53-103 µmol/L)|UNDEFINED_CODE_3, Stage 3 - bilirubin 6.1-15.0 mg/dL (104-256 µmol/L)|UNDEFINED_CODE_4, Stage 4 - bilirubin > 15.0 mg/dL ( > 256 µmol/L)

Field Label: Specify the maximum overall grade and organ staging of acute GVHD since the date of last report: Other site(s) involved with acute GVHD
Did chronic GVHD develop since the date of last report?
Date of chronic GVHD diagnosis - date estimated
Did chronic GVHD persist since the date of last report?
Maximum grade of chronic GVHD {according to best clinical judgment)
Specify if chronic GVHD was limited or extensive
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: UNDEFINED_CODE, Limited - localized skin involvement and/or liver dysfunction|UNDEFINED_CODE_1, Extensive - one or more of the following:|UNDEFINED_CODE_2, generalized skin involvement; or,|UNDEFINED_CODE_3, liver histology showing chronic aggressive hepatitis, bridging necrosis or cirrhosis; or,|UNDEFINED_CODE_4, involvement of eye: Schirmer's test with < 5 mm wetting; or|UNDEFINED_CODE_5, involvement of minor salivary glands or oral mucosa demonstrated on labial biopsy; or|UNDEFINED_CODE_6, involvement of any other target organ

Field Label: Date of maximum grade of chronic GVHD
